thread.title: Yaya Dub attends Lifehouse concert with heavy make-up and glasses
thread.title_full: Yaya Dub attends Lifehouse concert with heavy make-up and glasses

author: rmaricuelo
title: Yaya Dub attends Lifehouse concert with heavy make-up and glasses
text:
Yaya Dub attends Lifehouse concert with heavy make-up and glasses SHARES: 11:50 AM October 9th, 2015 Recommended October 9th, 2015 11:50 AM SCREENGRAB from Maine Mendoza’s Twitter account 
Wearing heavy make-up and glasses, Maine Mendoza also known as “Yaya Dub” attended the Lifehouse concert at the Mall of Asia Arena on Thursday night. 
Mendoza was first invited through a Twitter video by Bryce Soderberg, one of the Lifehouse members. 
In response to the invitation, Mendoza said she hoped to attend the concert. ADVERTISEMENT 
However, on Thursday night, Mendoza posted her photo on her Twitter account with heavy make-up and wearing glasses. 
She said, “it feels good to do something unusual and crazy.” 
“I had fun,” the post read. 
In a Twitter post, Soderberg regretted that he wasn’t able to meet Mendoza. 
“Heard you came. Sorry we missed you,” his post read. 
Mendoza confirmed that she indeed attended the concert, saying “I did! You guys did great and I had a really good time! Thank you!!! Hope to meet you next time.” 
Yaya Dub is the other half of the famous loveteam “AlDub,” a pair between Mendoza and actor Alden Richards in GMA-7’s noontime show Eat Bulaga’s “Kalyeserye.” NC/RAM SCREENGRAB from Maine Mendoza’s Twitter account SCREENGRAB from Bryce Soderberg’s Twitter account
